home.welcome:
Ah, you've arrived, {0}. I couldn't help but notice how busy you are these days...
If you could manage to find the time to sit and enjoy an opera together or share a pot of tea... Taking a moment to slow down and enjoy the finer things in life is always beneficial to your body and soul.
home.title: Home Page

index.s0: How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales. {'|'} 「云婵娟来花婵娟，风流尽在山水间。」
index.unfinished-note: This webpage is not finished yet. Most pages are not optimized for mobile. Please use the menu in the upper right corner to access available features.
index.title: Introduction Page

song-player.description: A music player for tracks released by HoYo-Mix, the music studio of HoYoVERSE

become-a-contributor.title: Become a Contributor
become-a-contributor.content: Want to become a contributor of this code pool? Please contact the author via About page. We'll provide you a token to submit redemption codes.

sp-key.description: Query the redemption codes for the SP/Special Program
